::Prowl/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Zardus/The Oblitercons/Scattershot::

The Alliance bots at the entrance look at the Maximals, hostility in their 
eyes. Pyro growls.

"When we get them," he says, looking at Dinobot and patting his gun, "I get 
to kill the big one."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl nods, moving closer to Iron Raptor. He could see she was not in top 
shape, carrying her might be better. "I'll give you a lift," he says, turning 
around to face Reptilica and the other Alliance members.

"Allright," he yells out to them, "Here it is!"

With that, he throws the device, spinning around and grabbing Iron Raptor 
around the waist, his legs springing out as he jumps up, sweeping Iron Raptor 
off her feet and starting to fly.

"Let's go," he yells down to Dinobot, clearing the trees.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica and Bloodystrike both jump for the device, smashing into each 
other. The fake detonator bounces off Reptilica's head, flying at Zardus.

Seeing the Maximals take off, Scattershot, Pyro, and Breakdown go after them, 
Scattershot and Breakdown following Prowl as Pyro runs at Dinobot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scavanger and Hiss turn their heads at the sound of Prowl yelling, then 
seeing the Maximals take off. Scavanger growls. "Don't we get any peace?"

Scavanger transforms into his undamaged HUMVEE mode, riding at Dinobot, Hiss 
running behind him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus growls as something hits him in the head, the Alliance commander 
easily catching a black device before it hits the ground. He turns around, 
looking at Reptilica and Bloodystrike, who were staring at him in horror. He 
turns off his comm-link.

"What is this?" he asks, looking calmly from the device to the escaping 
Maximals.

"Z-t-Um..," Reptilica says, trembling, "The Maximal put bombs in the engine 
room. That's the detonator. We traded the hostages for it."

Zardus coldly looks down at the device, his optics flashing slightly as he 
runs a scan through it, walking over to Reptilica.

"Idiot! Do you know what this is?" he asks Reptilica, his voice starting to 
get angry. He pushes the button on the device, Reptilica gasping. A beam of 
light emerges from the other end of the device as Reptilica and Bloodystrike 
look at it in horror.

"This is a slagging flashlight," Zardus growls, Reptilica backing off. "Go 
after them, you fools!"

Reptilica and Bloodystrike spin around, one flying off after Prowl, the other 
at Dinobot and Tavatron. Zardus crushes the flashlight, once again activating 
his comm-link. He recieves Megatron's transmission.

"Hmm... A cease fire, yes," he replies, "But I am too busy to help you for 
now. When we get the base repaired, I'll contact you about further 
negotiations."
